name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 16, a group of teenagers in Liusha West Street, Puning District, Jieyang City, Guangdong Province, drove motorcycles with steel knives in hand and hacked and killed two people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 16, parents from Luoling Community in Shenzhen protested in front of the Luohu District Government that the school districts were not allocated according to the principle of proximity. During the protest, many parents were arrested.

content: https://t.co/NTRuTQZ7ZV

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, all traffic sharing on this mini program has been cleared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @xiaojingcanxue Actually it’s not just these few days, but every day

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens reported on social platforms that when buying comic exhibition tickets, they need to fill in the dress information to the organizer. Including clothing, props and even personal photos.
One netizen posted his ticket purchase order to prove that this is true. If you don't fill in the information, your ticket will be refunded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 16, Haikou, Hainan. A man posted a video saying that his electric bike was seized by the traffic police for violating traffic rules. When he paid a 2,200 yuan fine and went to pick up the bike, he found that the battery on the bike was missing.
Later, the man said in an interview that the battery was gone and the staff asked him to prove that there was a battery on the bike.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 16, Jinan, Shandong. Two buses collided head-on on Gongye North Road

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of April 16, in Ganzhou, Jiangxi, the owners of the Dibowan community gathered outside the community to protest their rights because they were dissatisfied with the property management's collection of parking fees, and shouted "The property management should step down"
It is understood that the community has never collected parking fees in the five years since the handover, but recently the property management has begun to charge the owners more than 500 yuan per month for parking fees

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 16, the demolition of Baiyuntan Village in Guangzhou was temporarily halted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 16, Fitch downgraded the sovereign credit rating outlook of China's six major state-owned banks from "stable" to "negative".
Fitch said that the revision of the rating outlook of China's six major state-owned banks was made after the outlook of China's sovereign credit rating was adjusted from "stable" to "negative" on April 9, reflecting the increasing risks to China's public finance outlook against the backdrop of a more uncertain outlook for the Chinese economy during its transformation.
Fitch pointed out that the issuer default rating (IDR) of China's state-owned banks is closely linked to China's sovereignty, so if the relevant banks are at risk, the Chinese government will almost certainly support them. Fitch's downgrade of China's sovereign rating outlook shows that the agency believes that China's ability to provide additional support to state-owned banks will also be affected, which is naturally reflected in the rating outlook of state-owned banks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 17, in Harbin, Heilongjiang, a fire broke out in a high-rise apartment in Daowai District. The window frame was blown across the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 16, at the gate of Baicheng Medical College, several security guards pinned down a food delivery boy near the school gate. Someone at the scene shouted, "The security guards are beating people! Baicheng gangsters!" It seems that they were worried about the food delivery boy delivering flowers at the school gate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 13, Meishan, Sichuan. An 86-year-old man from Huangfeng Town was sent away by the local government on the pretext of cooperating with the work. But when he returned, he found that his house had been demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Blood stains on the bus

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @remilia_servant is cuter than my avatar

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of April 17, in Fengyang Village, Xinyu, Jiangxi, a dump truck overturned, crushing several cars. The casualties are not yet known.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 16, Changde, Hunan. A resident's window was blown off by the wind in Deshan Mingtian International Community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 17, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A man died suddenly while working at Shenzhen Liyinhui Technology Development Co., Ltd. His family members are defending their rights outside the company.
According to the video poster, the man died suddenly because the factory assigned too many tasks, and the factory is only willing to compensate 5,000 yuan. His wife is also an employee of the factory. Afterwards, the factory prevented his wife and her family from entering the factory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 17, the media reported that according to the statistics of the Mycos Research Institute, the monthly income of college graduates working in county towns has increased from 4,640 yuan in 2018 to 5,377 yuan in 2022. And the employment satisfaction rate has also increased from 67% in 2018 to 76% in 2022.
After the announcement of this news, a large number of netizens have been debunking fake news in the comment area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 16, Tangshan, Hebei. The Xiyangjiaying Village Committee forcibly seized villagers’ food-grain fields to build a building, and the villagers went to the Fengrun District Petition Bureau to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 17, Guangdong. A man and his daughter slept on the street, and a kind-hearted person gave the man dozens of yuan.
According to the man, his wife suffered from uterine cancer and there was no point in treating it. In order to treat his wife, he also delayed his daughter's schooling. He decided to leave the child to someone else to take care of and go to work on the construction site.
After the video was released, it attracted the attention of netizens. As of now, the father and daughter have received help from the street office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 17, a student from Heilongjiang University jumped from Huiwen Building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 15, in Yangxin County, Shandong Province, depositors knelt outside the county government to defend their rights. It is understood that under the guidance of the policy of bringing financial services to the countryside, financial inclusion service outlets of major banks have been opened in various towns and villages in Yangxin County. However, since March 9, depositors have found that they cannot withdraw the money they have in the outlets. The reason is that the depositors' deposits have been identified as illegal fundraising.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 17, Qinhuangdao, Hebei. The Shuiyifang real estate project owed workers wages, and workers gathered on the roof and threatened to jump off the building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 16, Shangcai County, Zhumadian, Henan. The Qin Xiangfu real estate project has been unfinished for more than five years, and there is still no sign of construction.
Owners gathered on the roadside to defend their rights, and there was a scuffle with the police, and some owners were taken away by the police.
